Detailed Description

template<int SIZE>
class matador::varchar< SIZE, std::string >

A varchar helper class for all has_many relations where the type should be a varchar

Default varchar type is of std::string, but const char* and char[] is also valid

Template Parameters
SIZEsize of the varchar

Member Typedef Documentation
